My browser (NC 4.7) won't finish downloading a one of the G:BF files 
because it stops after downloading ~1 meg.  Any ideas on what might be 
causing my problem?

**other**

I finally have Visual Studio.  I am tempted to write my own scenario 
converter as a way to refresh myself on programming in VB.  If someone 
could send me a copy of the notes on the scenario file, I would be 
gratefull.
